name: ql-oss-landing-page-mvp
description: Landing page for organizing Quicken Loans' open source projects.

scripts.build: npm run favicon && npm run index && npm run js && npm run sass
scripts.pages:publish: git push upstream `git subtree split --prefix build master`:gh-pages --force
scripts.prepages:publish: npm run build && git add build -f && git commit -am publishing
scripts.postpages:publish: git reset --hard master^ && npm run build

author: Joshua T Kalis <kalisjoshua@gmail.com> (http://kalisjoshua.me)
